title: Server status?
body:
I am noticing that the EUW server seems to be unstable lately. I got dc'ed 3 times this week which can't be caused by drophacks because the probability for that is just insanely low ^^ 
Soooo, can any Riot member confirm that publicly? It would clear a lot of the Drophack Discussion on this Site and on Reddit ^^

replies.body: Deutsches Forum, Deutsch bitte, Report Rito, steht überall...
